item.description:
Where do you find the Best Entertainment in Connecticut?

Whether you are looking for Restaurants, Fine Dining, Attractions, Music, Night Clubs, Bars, Arts, Theatre, Movies, Sports, Events, Dances, Movies, or Golf – Entertainment in CT gives you the best in Connecticut Entertainment Visit http://www.EntertainmentCT.com

CT Nites has the best of Dining, Restaurants, Night Clubs, Attractions, Arts and Theatre, Hotels and Inns, Sports, Movies, Events, Music, Banquet Facilities – the best of Connecticut Visit http://www.CTNites.com

CT Weekend Events Calendar shows you the best of Arts, Theater, Music, and Entertainment Events in Connecticut Visit http://www.CTWeekend.com

Spotlight on Connecticut give you interview with the most talented people in CT, from Arts and Theatre, CT Film Makers, Local CT Music and Musicians, Actors – Fresh each week and available 24-7 in Podcast format Visit http://www.SpotlightonCT.com

CT Golf Tips – The best of Golfing, Golf Lessons, Video Golf Lessons, Golf Courses, Golf Clubs and Equipment – All Golf All The Time!
Visit http://www.CTGolfTips.com

CT LIVE Music – Promoting Connecticut Music, Musicians, Bands, and LIVE Music. Vote each month in the CT LIVE Music Local Music Spotlight, and help CT Musicians get exposure and a new audience Visit http://www.CTLIVEMusic.com

CT Dance – Dancing Lessons and Events in Connecticut – If its Dance in CT, It's on http://www.CTDance.com

Central CT Singles – Meet Local Singles at our Dance Parties and Single Events in Connecticut Visit http://www.CentralCTSingles.com

The CT Theatre Group provides the Arts and Theatre lovers an opportunity to enjoy great Theatre events across Connecticut with other Theatre fans – and get discounts on Arts and Theatre Tickets Visit http://www.CTTheatreGroup.org
item.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends
